job.title: Software Engineer I
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
NCR Corporation (NYSE: NCR) is a leading software- and services-led enterprise provider in the financial, retail and hospitality industries. NCR is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, with 36,000 employees globally. NCR is a trademark of NCR Corporation in the United States and other countries.
Software Engineer - Dot Net developer
Location- Addison, TX
Working on the NCR Payments Gateway Team by working with team of software engineers to provide new features and functionality to the existing and next generation applications
Supporting production by triaging and managing hot fix releases and defects throughout the development life cycle including testing and deployment.
Facilitate requirements refinement and design sessions and translate information gathered in those sessions into business processes, system design documents, and models
Working with various communication and security protocols to improve the quality of the product.
REQUIRED (0-3 Years of Experience)
C#.NET Development
Web UI Development (HTML, CSS, etc.)
Database Development (MSSQL, TSQL)
Stored Procedures, Triggers, Joins, Unions, Analyzing Execution Plans, Query Debugging, Creation and Maintenance of Indexes, Replication Methodologies
Object-Oriented Programming
Automated Unit Testing (NUnit, etc.) and understanding of QA
Agile methodologies and frameworks (Scrum, Kanban, Lean, etc.)
Multi-Threading
Garbage Collection
Memory Management
Payment Processing Systems
Real Time Transaction Processing Systems
Windows and/or Linux OS Administration
Scripting Languages (Powershell, Python, Bash, etc)
Design Patterns (Pub/Sub, Asynchronous/Synchronous, Singleton, Factory, Broker, MEP (Message Exchange Patterns), etc.)
Nginx/Kestral
ISTIO/Service Mesh
Visual Studio 2019 or Eclipse IDE
Putty
Postman
Fiddler
GIT
Basic Networking and Understanding of Load Balancing Algorithms
Business Driven Development (BDD) and Test Driven Development (TDD) Practices
SOLID Programming Principles
Delivering Enterprise Level Solutions
Strong communication skills and desire to learn.
